description: Never. Stop. Running. Smartwool's PhD® Run Light Elite Pattern Low Cut socks will help you do just that. Featuring Light Elite cushioning, these technical running socks contain targeted cushioning placed where runners need it most; on the ball and heel of the foot. they jam-packed these socks full of smart features like their 4 Degree™ elite fit system, men’s-specific mesh ventilation zones, and a Virtually Seamless™ toe. A low cut height provides that ideal balance of protection and style in these Merino wool running socks.
name: Smartwool PhD Run Light Targeted Cushion Pattern Low Cut Socks - Mens
